work_areas.title: Requirements & Design
work_areas.description: Define what we're building and how

work_areas.title: Testing & Polish
work_areas.description: Verify it works and clean up

packets.title: Define requirements and acceptance criteria
packets.scope: Document what the feature should do. List user stories or use cases. Define what 'done' looks like. Output: requirements.md

packets.title: Design technical approach
packets.scope: Based on requirements, design the implementation. Identify files to modify, new files needed, API changes. Output: design.md

packets.title: Identify edge cases and risks
packets.scope: Review requirements and design for gaps. List edge cases to handle. Identify integration risks. Update design.md with findings.

packets.title: Implement core functionality
packets.scope: Build the main feature as designed. Focus on the happy path first. Commit working code.

packets.title: Implement edge case handling
packets.scope: Add handling for edge cases identified in FEAT-003. Add input validation, error handling, boundary checks.

packets.title: Add integration points
packets.scope: Connect feature to existing system. Update any APIs, hooks, or interfaces needed. Ensure backward compatibility.

packets.title: Write unit tests
packets.scope: Add tests for core functionality and edge cases. Target >80% coverage on new code. All tests must pass.

packets.title: Integration testing
packets.scope: Test feature in context of full system. Verify it works with existing features. Check for regressions.

packets.title: Documentation and cleanup
packets.scope: Update README or docs with feature info. Add inline comments where needed. Remove debug code. Final code review.
